ABOUT US

We’re led by a duo that is passionate, dedicated and hardworking. Always leading by example, challenging Shuga’s carefully curated team members to think outside the box, bringing best in class actionable insights to our retail partners and of course generous rewards for our beloved SHUGA app users!

It’s a tough retail environment where consumers’ expectations far surpass what retailers can often give, creating a disjoint.
Platforms today need to deliver valuable connections and personalization to close up the gap, creating a win-win situation.

Thomas Ong, CEO

Convert every drop of your marketing dollars into shopper engagement. We ensure your customers are well rewarded for their shopping experience with you;
the experience is then digitised and transformed into actionable insights for you through our unique artificial intelligence platform.

Jeffrey Chang, CTO
